system.description:
You have attuned your mind to the natural world. You gain the following benefits:

  • Your Wisdom score or your Intelligence score increases by +1, to a maximum of 20.
  • While you have Psychic Focus active, you treat areas that are lightly obscured as if they were not obscured.
  • You may apply basic Psionic Augments to your ranged weapon attacks.
system.prerequisite: 3 levels in Esper, 3 levels in Ranger
